layout.subject: Congratulations Your Content has won  !!!
layout.sms: Dear {{ user.name }}, Congratulations Your Content has won  !!!
layout.body:
Dear {{ user.name }}

Congratulations !!!

The content that you submit for our contest has gain the most point.


Winning Content.
{{ blog.title }}
{{ blog.blog|striptags|truncate(150) }}

Attached is a copy of the certificate

Continue submiting you content for more contest awards.

Thank you.

layout.subject: Sorry Your Content has Lost  !!!
layout.sms: Dear {{ user.name }}, Sorry Your Content has Lost  !!!
layout.body:
Dear {{ user.name }}

Sorry !!!

The content that you submit for our contest has lost the contest.


Content.
{{ blog.title }}
{{ blog.blog|striptags|truncate(150) }}

Continue submiting you content for more contest awards.

If you need any help, please let us know so that we can assist you.

Thank you.
